name: Crownful
0:
”Alexa, turn on the ice maker”
”Alexa, turn off the ice maker”
”Alexa, set ice maker to large mode”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the CROWNFUL skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your device with your voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa app
Link your CROWNFUL account and discover your device.
When using this skill, you need to establish a name for your device. There are two ways to define these names:
Use the name you set earlier. They are displayed in the CROWNFUL app and can be changed
Create an Alexa group, such as Kitchen or Downstairs, and add devices to the group.
Once you know the name or group name of the device, you can say the following:
"Alexa, turn on the ice maker"
"Alexa, turn off the ice maker"
